name: LitMan Level Three Twelve
description:
[quote]Latest Update. Dev Kit Version 300976.29848.[/quote]

[b]Up to Level 312.[/b]

Original Stats:
60 Levels
7 619 025 XP
402 Attribute Points
497 Feats

Modded Stats:
312 Levels
2 636 725 626 XP
9891 Attribute Points
12013 Feats

Does not work with "LitMan Level Seventy Eight" and "LitMan Level One Fifty Six".

It is safe to replace "LitMan Level Seventy Eight" or "LitMan Level One Fifty Six" with this Mod. 

[quote]IMPORTANT: This Mod increases Level needed to open Legendary Chests to 312. If you want to be able open Legendary Chests from Level 1 you could use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1367028501]LitMan Loot Legendary Chests[/url].[/quote]

Support Channel on Discord: https://discord.gg/TK8zPtH

I released all my Source files on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods if anyone wants to keep updated those Mods or release own ones.

If you need a previous version it also could be found on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods/tree/master/Compiled
